description: A hpnicfWirelessCardInserted notification is generated when a wireless
card is inserted.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HPN-ICF-3GMODEM-MIB::hpnicfWirelessCardInserted HPN-ICF-3GMODEM-MIB::hpnicfDeviceOUI s EXAMPLE HPN-ICF-3GMODEM-MIB::hpnicfDevSerialNumber s EXAMPLE HPN-ICF-3GMODEM-MIB::hpnicfWirelessCardSerialNumber s EXAMPLE HPN-ICF-3GMODEM-MIB::hpnicfUIMImsi s EXAMPLE

description: The OUI (Organizational Unique Identifier) of the current device.

description: The serial number of the current device.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-3GMODEM-MIB::hpnicfDevSerialNumber

description: The vendor-specific serial number string for this card.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-3GMODEM-MIB::hpnicfWirelessCardSerialNumber

description: The IMSI (International Mobile Subscriber Identification Number) about
this UIM. If this information is unknown to the agent, then this object
will be returned a zero-length string.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-3GMODEM-MIB::hpnicfUIMImsi
